A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Personally I thought that this was a fantastic movie. Johnson moved the Star Wars storyline into a new direction and I for one am thrilled. The overrunning theme of Let the Past Die is evident throughout the entire move mixed in with spectacular action some great humor and even a couple of non-canon Force abilities from the Expanded Universe sprinkled in! I'm excited to see where IX takes us AND where Johnson takes us on his new trilogy!
